original_title: Dr. Ravi Bamunusinghe empowers Pan Asia Bank’s team towards a thriving SME sector
original_body_lines: An SME Development Programme was hosted by Pan Asia Bank recently under the expertise of reputed trainer, researcher and SME consultant, Dr. Ravi Bamunusinghe. This event was held to align Pan Asia Bank staff with the changes in the industry and to empower them with the necessary skills especially in the background of the current economic context and future prospects.

Continuous development and training of staff is a key component of Pan Asia Bank. Synonymous with Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) banking, Pan Asia Bank remains committed to empowering SMEs to reach their full potential by helping them to overcome the challenges emanating from the economic crisis through training its staff to fulfil their needs.

Dr. Bamunusinghe is currently engaged in the development of SMEs in Sri Lanka and in the blueprint committee and the jury of the SME Development Awards 2022. Dr. Bamunusinghe took part in this exercise without receiving any benefit, with the sole objective of developing the SME sector in the country.
